zonesFollowMaster.title: Set ALL Zones to Master Temp on Master Temp Change
zonesFollowMaster.description: Sets 'Control All Zones' for master temp changes. Recommended to leave this setting on.

zonesPushMaster.title: Adjust Master Temp if Zone Set Outside of Permitted Thresholds
zonesPushMaster.description: If zone is set outside of allowed +/- 2 degree variance then push the master temp to allow setting

zonesAsHeaterCoolers.title: Expose each zone as configurable Heater/Cooler accessories in HomeKit
zonesAsHeaterCoolers.description: If set to true, each zone will show as Heater/Cooler accessories inside HomeKit. Recommended that this is left false, which will cause each zone to show as an on off switch instead.

clientName.title: Client Name
clientName.description: Used to register plugin on Neo Cloud as an 'Authorised Device' & default HomeKit name.

refreshInterval.title: Periodic Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: Time in seconds to refresh device state information from Neo API and in HomeKit.

deviceSerial.title: Neo System Serial Number
deviceSerial.description: Only required if you have multiple systems in your Neo cloud account.
deviceSerial.placeholder: Leave Blank If You Have A Single Neo System - Plugin Will Auto Discover

adjustThresholds.title: Modify default heating cooling threshold temperatures
adjustThresholds.description: Cooling default min/max = 10/24. Heating default min/max = 16/30

maxCoolingTemp.title: Maximum Cooling Temp
maxCoolingTemp.description: Maximum temp setting for cooling in degrees celsius

minCoolingTemp.title: Minimum Cooling Temp
minCoolingTemp.description: Minimum temp setting for cooling in degrees celsius

maxHeatingTemp.title: Maximum Heating Temp
maxHeatingTemp.description: Maximum temp setting for heating in degrees celsius

minHeatingTemp.title: Minimum Heating Temp
minHeatingTemp.description: Minimum temp setting for heating in degrees celsius
